Actions.Text:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys

def stream_to_marked(data):
	from AppKit import NSPasteboard
	pb = NSPasteboard.pasteboardWithName_("mkStreamingPreview")
	pb.clearContents()
	pb.setString_forType_(data, 'public.utf8-plain-text')

d = [  ]
for line in sys.stdin:
	d.append(line)
stream_to_marked("\n".join(d))

tell application "Marked 2"	set l to name of every document	if (l does not contain "Streaming Preview__marked2.streamingpreview.mktransient") then		do shell script "open x-marked://stream/"	end ifend tell
